meanings.definition: Lacking a pile or nap, as a carpet or fabric.
meanings.sent1: The pileless carpet felt smooth under my feet.
meanings.sent2: She chose a pileless fabric for the sofa because it was easier to clean.
meanings.sent3: The pileless carpet was jealous of the fluffy rugs in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her pileless dress was like a clear sky without any clouds.
meanings.sent5: The pileless material looked like a calm lake without any ripples.

meanings.definition: Without a pile or nap, as a carpet or fabric.
meanings.sent1: I prefer pileless carpets because they are easier to vacuum.
meanings.sent2: The pileless fabric was perfect for the hot summer weather.
meanings.sent3: The pileless carpet tried to sneak into the fluffy rug party.
meanings.sent4: His pileless jacket was as sleek as a dolphin gliding through water.
meanings.sent5: The pileless texture felt like a smooth stone in my hand.
